Name: Northern Lights
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of star anise floated on surface.
Review: Wonderfully refreshing: apple and anise served up on a grassy vodka base.
History: Created in 2003 by Stuart 'Holiday' Hudson at MJU Bar, Millennium Hotel, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Northern Lights contains 273 calories
